name: boilerplate-app
description: Modern web app boilerplate with Next.js, NestJS, and Docker

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && npm run build:demo
scripts.test: cd frontend && npm test && cd backend && npm test && cd demo && npm test
scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:demo
scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && npm install && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
